headline: Charter Communications (NasdaqGS:CHTR) Reports Q1 Earnings Growth and New Director Appointment
summary: Charter Communications (NasdaqGS:CHTR) recently experienced a 10% share price increase over the past week. This move coincides with the company's release of strong first-quarter earnings results, reporting a rise in both net income and earnings per share. Additionally, the election of Martin E. Patterson to the board during its Annual Meeting of Stockholders underscores changes in leadership. Despite these impactful developments, the market itself also saw growth of nearly 5% during this...

headline: Why Charter Rallies While T-Mobile Sells Off
summary: T-Mobile and Charter stocks showed outsized moves in opposite directions after Q1 results. Read more on the key factors behind TMUS & CHTR stock moves.
